name: Standing Watch
description: Maintaining alertness to guard against threats, observing surroundings for danger

srdReferences.quote: perform no more than 2 hours of light activity, such as reading, talking, eating, or standing watch
A Short Rest is a period of downtime—at least 1 hour—during which you do nothing more strenuous than eating, drinking, reading, and keeping watch
For each of those days that you spend resting and doing nothing more than light activity, your remaining recovery time decreases by 2 days

examples: Taking first watch at wilderness campsite
Guarding the door during dungeon short rest
Observing the road from inn window
Maintaining lookout at a watch post

perceptionChecks.description: Character can make Perception checks to detect threats
perceptionChecks.advantage: May be granted by facilities like watch posts or elevated positions

initiativeBonus.description: If watch detects ambush, party may not be surprised

watchRotation.note: With 4 party members, 2-hour shifts cover full 8-hour Long Rest
watchRotation.calculation: Each member watches 2 hours, sleeps 6 hours

downtimeUses.name: Guard Duty
downtimeUses.description: Extended sentry work for pay or as part of military service
downtimeUses.payment: Variable based on risk and employer

downtimeUses.name: Security Detail
downtimeUses.description: Protecting a person, location, or valuable cargo

watchRotationExample.result: Each member gets 6 hours sleep + 2 hours watch = valid Long Rest
